-pa# dadhAtiq tasmA#dakShNaqyA paqSavO&~ggA#niq praha#rantiq prati#ShThityaiq yAH prAcIqstABiq-rvasi#ShTha Ad^^rdhnOqdyA da#kShiqNA tABi#rBaqradvA#jOq yAH praqtIcIqstABi# rviqSvAmi#trOq yA udI#cIqstABi#-rjaqmada#gniqryA 
Uqd^^rdhvAstABi#-rviqSvaka#rmAq ya EqvamEqtAsAqmRuddhiqM ~MvEdaqd^^rdhnOtyEqva ya A#sAmEqvaM baqndhutAqM ~MvEdaq bandhu#mAn Bavatiq ya A#sAmEqvaM klRuptiqM ~MvEdaq kalpa#tE - [  ] 58
